items.summary: Update the translation press-and-hold control in `frontend/src/quiz/QuizGameplay.tsx` (currently the English-flag icon with the small "hilfe" label) to display a funny-looking, bold "Plan-B" sign-style text instead of the flag image and "hilfe".
Preserve existing translation behavior for the control (press/hold shows translation; release hides it), including disabled/loading behavior while translating, after swapping the UI to "Plan-B".

Ensure user-facing text associated with the control is in English (e.g., tooltip/title/aria-label) and reflects the new "Plan-B" presentation while still communicating the action (press and hold to translate to English).
